name: A Snake's Tale
description: A Snake's Tale is a puzzle game about snakes in cramped places. Clear a path to get to the hole, eat some eggs along the way, and make sure to press all the buttons.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core CPU (64 bit) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU (64 bit) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 Storage: 50 MB available space
